text: @GregAbbott_TX If just one single healthcare  worker in Texas becomes positive with Covid19 and god forbid passes away that is on you. 100%. Their blood will be on your hands. There has to be a precedent to hold those responsible that puts Trumps campaigning over the wellbeing of their people
